title: Answer
context: [§659-5] Answer. The person to whom the order is directed shall file the person&rsquo;s answer in writing, within the time limited by the order as determined by the court in its discretion, and state the authority under which the person claims to act. [L 1876, c 39, §39; RL 1925, §2719; RL 1935, §4261; RL 1945, §10282; RL 1955, §236-22; HRS §659-49; am L 1972, c 90, §3(e); ren HRS §659-5; gen ch 1985] Case Notes Burden on respondent, when. 29 H. 392 (1926).
